import React from 'react'; import DashboardLayout from './DashboardLayout'; const Dashboard = () => { return ; // Enhanced status colors and utility functions const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'pending': case 'active': return 'text-amber-700 bg-amber-100 border-amber-200'; case 'interview': return 'text-blue-700 bg-blue-100 border-blue-200'; case 'under_review': return 'text-indigo-700 bg-indigo-100 border-indigo-200'; case 'rejected': case 'closed': return 'text-red-700 bg-red-100 border-red-200'; case 'accepted': return 'text-emerald-700 bg-emerald-100 border-emerald-200'; default: return 'text-gray-700 bg-gray-100 border-gray-200'; } }; const ProgressBar = ({ value, max = 100, color = 'bg-blue-500', label }) => (
{label &&
{label} {value}%
}
); const MiniChart = ({ data, color = 'stroke-blue-500' }) => (
{data.map((value, index) => (
))}
); return (
